what_we_decided: 2026-01-09 - First contact happens at Jupiter, not Earth orbit

what_we_resolved: 2026-01-11 - What do aliens look like? Humanoid? Truly alien? → Resolved: Non-humanoid but bilaterally symmetric, hive intelligence but individual-capable, communicates via color patterns
2026-01-15 - Timeline problem: alien homeworld is 8 light-years away. How did they reach Earth so quickly? → Resolved: Aliens were already in the solar system exploring
